verbose_text: We performed a Seahorse Assay to quantify the oxygen consumption rate (OCR) in the presence and absence of ETO, an irreversible inhibitor of carnitine palmitoyltransferase-1 (CPT-1) which blocks the transport of fatty acyl chains from the cytoplasm to the mitochondrial intermembrane space, thereby blocking fatty acid oxidation.
evidence: ETO, an irreversible inhibitor of carnitine palmitoyltransferase-1 (CPT-1) which blocks the transport of fatty acyl chains from the cytoplasm to the mitochondrial intermembrane space, thereby blocking fatty acid
